snippet: Emma Talley, entering her sophomore season at Alabama, won the United States Women’s Amateur, defeating Yueer Cindy Feng, 2 and 1, in Charleston, S.C.
abstract: Golfer Emma Talley, entering her sophomore season at Alabama, wins United States Women’s Amateur in Charleston, SC.
lead_paragraph: Emma Talley, entering her sophomore season at Alabama, won the United States Women’s Amateur, defeating Yueer Cindy Feng, 2 and 1, in Charleston, S.C.
